 前のクラス   次のクラス フレームあり    フレームなし

org.mozilla.javascript
インタフェース Callable

既知のサブインタフェースの一覧:
Function, RefCallable
既知の実装クラスの一覧:
BaseFunction, Continuation, Delegator, FunctionObject, IdFunctionObject, NativeFunction, NativeJavaClass, NativeJavaConstructor, NativeJavaMethod, NativeJavaTopPackage, NativeRegExp, Synchronizer
public interface Callable

Generic notion of callable object that can execute some script-related code upon request with specified values for script scope and this objects.

メソッドの概要
 java.lang.Object call(Context cx, Scriptable scope, Scriptable thisObj, java.lang.Object[] args)
          Perform the call.
 

メソッドの詳細

call

java.lang.Object call(Context cx,
                      Scriptable scope,
                      Scriptable thisObj,
                      java.lang.Object[] args)
Perform the call.

パラメータ:
cx - the current Context for this thread
scope - the scope to use to resolve properties.
thisObj - the JavaScript this object
args - the array of arguments
戻り値:
the result of the call
